# vImage_PerpsectiveTransform.QuadrilateralPoints

**Type Alias**

A tuple of four points that define a quadrilateral.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias QuadrilateralPoints = (CGPoint, CGPoint, CGPoint, CGPoint)
```
